column4: hi all .. anybody ever got this error while using wubi ?: "Cannot download the metalink and therefore the ISO"
are you trying to install Lucid?
great, it seems you didn't read Lucid's release notes carefully, the current wubi is buggy, you need to download it from here http://releases.ubuntu.com/10.04/wubi.exe
for further info, please ask in #ubuntu+1
